Events.Name: Christmas Chaos Key Contest
Events.Description: Collect and spend Chaos Keys to earn over 150,000 Christmas Chaos Ingots and other AWESOME prizes!

Events.Name: Christmas Chaos Showdown Faction Contest
Events.Description: COMPETE AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL! EQUIP AND UPGRADE THE SHOWDOWN PERKS IN YOUR ROSTER SCREEN!

Methods.Description: Win a CHRISTMAS CHAOS Showdown Match

Events.Name: Christmas Chaos Contest
Events.Description: Make progress by earning Christmas Chaos Ingots, increasing the talent of Wendi Richter "Rock n' Wrestling" and MORE to win many valuable items like Epic Straps with EXTRA TURN Boosts!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Make progress by earning Christmas Chaos Ingots, increasing the talent of Wendi Richter "Rock n' Wrestling" and MORE to win many valuable items like Epic Straps with EXTRA TURN Boosts!

Methods.Description: Increase the talent of Wendi Richter "Rock n' Wrestling" by 1

Events.Name: Christmas Chaos Countdown
Events.Description: Compete in the 12 Days of Blitzmas, win Feuds and Showdowns with various Legend Superstars and MORE to earn Ho-Ho-Ho Coins, 900 TP, over 20 Million Coins, 2 Epic Legend Straps and 6 5-Star Silver Tokens!

Methods.Description: Increase the talent of Mr. T "T"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with any Legend Era Superstar
Win a Christmas Chaos Showdown Match with Wendi Richter "Rock n' Wrestling"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Roddy Piper "Rowdy"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Jim Duggan "Hacksaw"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Randy Savage "Macho Man"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Nikolai Volkoff "The Russian"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Bruno Sammartino "The Italian Strongman"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Andre the Giant "Eighth Wonder of the World"
Win a Christmas Chaos Showdown Match with Bruno Sammartino "The Italian Strongman"
Win a Faction Feud Battle with Mr. T "T"
Win a Christmas Chaos Showdown Match with Mr. T "T"
Defeat all opponents in the 12 Days of Blitzmas Gauntlet Blitz
